sqlMap.sql:
select A.BATCH_ID as batchId, A.IMP_TIME as impTime, A.IMP_USER as impUser, A.IMP_INST AS impInst, sum(DECODE(A.BATCH_ID, B.IMP_BATCH_ID, 1, 0)) as count, sum(DECODE(B.D_STATUS, '000000000000', 1, 0)) as passCount, sum(CASE WHEN A.STATUS = '0' THEN 0 WHEN B.D_STATUS <> '000000000000' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) as unPassCount, A.STATUS as status from VMS_TRANS_BATCH A left join U_BASE_INST UBI on A.IMP_INST = UBI.INST_ID left join VMS_TRANS_INFO_IMP_DATA B ON A.BATCH_ID = B.IMP_BATCH_ID
a.IMP_INST in
#auth_inst_ids[]#
a.IMP_TIME >= str_to_date(#startTime#, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
a.IMP_TIME <= str_to_date(#endTime#, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
a.IMP_INST = #impInst#
a.STATUS = $status$
a.STATUS in
#statusList[]#
group by A.IMP_TIME, A.IMP_USER,A.STATUS, A.BATCH_ID, A.IMP_INST
sqlMap.select: select a.imp_id as impId, a.trans_id transId, b.customer_id as customerId, a.trans_date as transDate, c.trans_type_id as transType, a.trans_amt as transAmt, a.tax_flag as taxFlag, a.tax_rate as taxRate, a.tax_amt as taxAmt, d.inst_id as bankCode, a.fapiao_type as fapiaoType, a.is_reverse as isReverse, a.reverse_trans_id as reverseTransId, a.trans_fapiao_flag as transFapiaoFlag, a.income as income from VMS_TRANS_INFO_IMP_DATA a left join VMS_CUSTOMER_INFO b on a.customer_id = b.customer_id left join vms_trans_type c on a.trans_type = c.trans_type_id left join u_base_inst d on a.bank_code = d.inst_id where a.imp_id = #vmsTransInfo.impId#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into VMS_TRANS_BATCH ( STATUS, BATCH_ID, IMP_TIME, IMP_INST, IMP_USER ) values ( #status#, #batchId#,
str_to_date(#impTime#, '%Y-%m-%d %hH:%i:%s'),
#impInst#, #impUser# )
sqlMap.update: update VMS_TRANS_BATCH set STATUS = #status# where BATCH_ID = #batchId#
sqlMap.sql:
select #status# AS status, vtiid.IMP_ID impId, vtiid.IMP_BATCH_ID impBatchId, vtiid.IMP_STATUS impStatus, vtiid.CUSTOMER_ID customerId, vtiid.TRANS_ID transId, vtiid.TRANS_DATE transDate, vtiid.TRANS_TYPE transType, vtiid.TRANS_AMT transAmt, vtiid.TAX_FLAG taxFlag, vtiid.BANK_CODE bankCode, vtiid.FAPIAO_TYPE fapiaoType, vtiid.IS_REVERSE isReverse, vtiid.REVERSE_TRANS_ID reverseTransId, vtiid.TRANS_FAPIAO_FLAG as transFapiaoType, vtiid.REMARK as remark, vtiid.SHORT_AND_OVER as shortAndOver, vtiid.TAX_RATE as taxRate, vtiid.MESSAGE as message, vtiid.D_STATUS as dStatus, vtiid.INCOME as income, vtiid.TAX_AMT as taxAmt from VMS_Trans_Info_Imp_data vtiid
vtiid.IMP_BATCH_ID = #impBatchId#
vtiid.IMP_STATUS = #impStatus#
vtiid.IMP_STATUS in
#impStatusList[]#
vtiid.CUSTOMER_ID like '%$customerId$%'
vtiid.TRANS_ID = #transId#
str_to_date(vtiid.TRANS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') >= str_to_date(#startTime#, '%y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s')
str_to_date(vtiid.TRANS_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') <= str_to_date(#endTime#, '%y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s')
vtiid.TRANS_AMT >= $transAmtStart$
vtiid.TRANS_AMT <= $transAmtEnd$
vtiid.TRANS_TYPE like '%$transType$%'
vtiid.FAPIAO_TYPE = #fapiaoType#
order by vtiid.IMP_STATUS
sqlMap.insert: insert into VMS_TRANS_INFO_IMP_DATA ( IMP_ID, IMP_BATCH_ID, TRANS_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, TRANS_DATE, TRANS_TYPE, TRANS_AMT, TAX_FLAG, BANK_CODE, FAPIAO_TYPE, IS_REVERSE, REVERSE_TRANS_ID, TRANS_FAPIAO_FLAG, TAX_RATE, REMARK, TAX_AMT, SHORT_AND_OVER, INCOME ) values ( #impId#, #impBatchId#, #transId#, #customerId#, #transDate#, #transType#, #transAmt#, #taxFlag#, #instcode#, #fapiaoType#, #isReverse#, #reverseTransId#, #transFapiaoFlag#, #taxRate#, #remark#, #taxAmt#, #shortAndOver#, #income# )
sqlMap.update:
update VMS_TRANS_INFO_IMP_DATA set IMP_ID = #impId#
IMP_STATUS = #impStatus#
FAPIAO_TYPE = #fapiaoType#
IS_REVERSE = #isReverse#
MESSAGE = #message#
D_STATUS = #dStatus#
where IMP_ID = #impId#
update VMS_TRANS_INFO_IMP_DATA a set a.D_STATUS = #dStatus# where a.imp_id = #impId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into vms_trans_info ( trans_id, trans_date, trans_type, customer_account, tax_flag, tax_rate, is_reverse, bank_code, remark, org_curr_code, org_acc_no, amt_ccy, reverse_trans_id, short_and_over, balance, instcode, datastatus, customer_id, amt_cny, tax_amt_cny, income_cny, org_trans_type, org_trans_sub_type, reverse_trans_date, reverse_trans_bus_id, trans_bus_id, trans_curr, tax_amt_ccy, income_ccy, surtax1_amt_cny, surtax2_amt_cny, surtax3_amt_cny, surtax4_amt_cny, trans_fapiao_flag, fapiao_date, fapiao_type, trans_flag, vat_rate_code, billing_time, associate_account_no, orig_cap_workstation, item_code, instname, data_sources, tax_cny_balance, gl_code ) values( #transInfo.transId#, #transInfo.transDate#, #transInfo.transType#, #transInfo.customerAccount#, #transInfo.taxFlag#, #transInfo.taxRate#, #transInfo.isReverse#, #transInfo.bankCode#, #transInfo.remark#, #transInfo.orgCurrCode#, #transInfo.orgAccNo#, #transInfo.amtCcy#, #transInfo.reverseTransId#, #transInfo.shortAndOver#, #transInfo.balance#, #transInfo.instcode#, #transInfo.datastatus#, #transInfo.customerId#, #transInfo.amtCny#, #transInfo.taxAmtCny#, #transInfo.incomeCny#, #transInfo.orgTransType#, #transInfo.orgTransSubType#, #transInfo.reverseTransDate#, #transInfo.reverseTransBusId#, #transInfo.transBusId#, #transInfo.transCurr#, #transInfo.taxAmtCcy#, #transInfo.incomeCcy#, #transInfo.surtax1AmtCny#, #transInfo.surtax2AmtCny#, #transInfo.surtax3AmtCny#, #transInfo.surtax4AmtCny#, #transInfo.transFapiaoFlag#, #transInfo.fapiaoDate#, #transInfo.fapiaoType#, #transInfo.transFlag#, #transInfo.vatRateCode#, #transInfo.billingTime#, #transInfo.associateAccountNo#, #transInfo.origCapWorkstation#, #transInfo.itemCode#, #transInfo.instname#, #transInfo.dataSources#, #transInfo.taxCnyBalance#, #transInfo.glCode # )
sqlMap.delete:
delete from VMS_Trans_Info_Imp_data where IMP_BATCH_ID in
'$batchID[]$'

delete from vms_trans_batch where BATCH_ID in
'$batchID[]$'

delete from VMS_Trans_Info_Imp_data where IMP_STATUS ='2' AND IMP_BATCH_ID in
'$batchID[]$'

delete from vms_trans_batch where BATCH_ID in
'$batchID[]$'
sqlMap.select: select IMP_ID as impId, IMP_BATCH_ID as impBatchId, IMP_STATUS as impStatus, CUSTOMER_ID as customerId, TRANS_ID as transId, TRANS_DATE as transDate, (select TRANS_TYPE_NAME from vms_trans_type where TRANS_TYPE_ID=impTransInfo.TRANS_TYPE) as transType, TRANS_AMT as transAmt, TAX_FLAG as taxFlag, (select INST_NAME from u_base_inst where INST_ID=impTransInfo.BANK_CODE) as bankCode, FAPIAO_TYPE as fapiaoType, IS_REVERSE as isReverse, REVERSE_TRANS_ID as reverseTransId, REMARK as remark, TRANS_FAPIAO_FLAG as transFapiaoType, TAX_RATE as taxRate, SHORT_AND_OVER as shortAndOver, MESSAGE as message, D_STATUS as dStatus from VMS_Trans_Info_Imp_data impTransInfo where IMP_BATCH_ID=#batchID#
select count(*) from VMS_Trans_Info_Imp_data where IMP_BATCH_ID=#batchID#
sqlMap.insert: insert into vms_trans_info (TRANS_ID,TRANS_DATE,TRANS_TYPE,TRANS_FLAG,TAX_RATE,IS_REVERSE,BANK_CODE,REMARK,AMT_CCY,REVERSE_TRANS_ID,SHORT_AND_OVER,CUSTOMER_ID,TRANS_FAPIAO_FLAG,FAPIAO_TYPE) select impTransInfo.TRANS_ID as TRANS_ID, impTransInfo.TRANS_DATE as TRANS_DATE, impTransInfo.TRANS_TYPE as TRANS_TYPE, impTransInfo.TAX_FLAG as TRANS_FLAG, impTransInfo.TAX_RATE as TAX_RATE, impTransInfo.IS_REVERSE as IS_REVERSE, impTransInfo.BANK_CODE as BANK_CODE, impTransInfo.REMARK as REMARK, impTransInfo.TRANS_AMT as AMT_CCY, impTransInfo.REVERSE_TRANS_ID as REVERSE_TRANS_ID, impTransInfo.SHORT_AND_OVER as SHORT_AND_OVER, impTransInfo.CUSTOMER_ID as CUSTOMER_ID, impTransInfo.TRANS_FAPIAO_FLAG as TRANS_FAPIAO_FLAG, impTransInfo.FAPIAO_TYPE as FAPIAO_TYPE from vms_trans_batch transBatch right join vms_trans_info_imp_data impTransInfo on transBatch.Batch_Id=impTransInfo.Imp_Batch_Id where transBatch.Batch_Id=#batchID# and transBatch.Status='4' AND impTransInfo.imp_status='2'
sqlMap.update: update vms_trans_batch set STATUS='6' where BATCH_ID=#batchId#
update vms_trans_info_imp_data d set d.imp_status = date_format((case when cast((replace (d.D_STATUS, ',', ''))as signed integer) = 0 then '2' else '1' end)) where d.imp_batch_id = #batchID#
update vms_trans_batch b set b.status = '3' where b.batch_id = #batchId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into vms_trans_info (trans_id, trans_date, trans_type, customer_account, tax_flag, tax_rate, is_reverse, bank_code, remark, reverse_trans_id, short_and_over, balance, instcode, datastatus, customer_id, amt_cny, tax_amt_cny, income_cny, trans_curr, trans_fapiao_flag, fapiao_type, trans_flag, DSOURCE) select a.TRANS_ID, a.TRANS_DATE, a.TRANS_TYPE, c.customer_account, a.tax_flag, a.tax_rate, a.is_reverse, a.bank_code, a.remark, a.reverse_trans_id, a.short_and_over, a.trans_amt as balance, a.bank_code as instcode, '1' as datastatus, a.customer_id, a.trans_amt as amt_cny, a.tax_amt as tax_amt_cny, a.income as income_cny, 'CNY' as trans_curr, a.trans_fapiao_flag, a.fapiao_type, '2' as trans_flag, '99' as DSOURCE from VMS_TRANS_INFO_IMP_DATA a left join u_base_inst b on a.bank_code = b.inst_id left join vms_customer_info c on a.customer_id = c.customer_id where a.imp_batch_id = #batchId# and a.d_status = '000000000000'
sqlMap.delete: delete from VMS_TRANS_INFO_IMP_DATA where imp_batch_id = #batchId# and d_status = '000000000000'
delete from vms_trans_batch a where a.batch_id not in (select b.imp_batch_id from vms_trans_info_imp_data b)
sqlMap.update: update VMS_TRANS_BATCH set STATUS = '1' where BATCH_ID = #batchId#
